website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use curl machine by a popular brand with a frequent sale price and exceptional warranty, all of which add to its overall value.
pros: Heats up fast and is easy to use
Made by a recognizable name in hair care and is often available on sale
Five-year limited warranty is one of the best in the industry
cons: Only has two heat settings with a maximum temperature of 400°F, which isn't quite as powerful as similar options we considered

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Used twice recently and had great results! No problems at all. The negative reviews seem to be people not using it properly. Small sections work best and just takes some time to get used to what type of curl you want. Even on African American hair it does a great job. I got many complements on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turner Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Clearly used-gross!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I were very excited to use this product, however upon arrival, we noticed hair wound around the brusheless motor inside the ceramic curling chamber. Considering we paid full price for a new item, not used, the lack of sanitary inspection prior to shipping is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ckj

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this infinitipro curl iron and it was horrible! I have medium long hair and when it works it curls your hair really nice, but at one point my hair got stuck and I literally had to turn off the iron cause my hair was stuck in it and it would of burned it even more than what it did I had to yank it out and it pulled some of my hair off, I honest;y thought I would have to cut that piece of hair I just couldn't take it out of the curling chamber, I honestly panicked. I returned this item for this reason. I do not recommend this iron. : (
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: This product MIGHT work for some hair types but not mine. I have long (almost to my butt) hair. The first couple of times, the tool worked fine. I chose another piece of hair, about 1/2 inch and it snarled around the tool. I was able to get it out. I recombed it and took a little more out and tried again. This time, it tangled so badly that I ended up having to cut my hair. Luckily my hair is long, you can’t really tell but I was upset. I ended up grabbing my regular curling iron and was able to achieve the same or better results. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Kipper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for tweens or older, nice curls and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter who has long thick hair. It curled nicely, she was able to do it herself, easy to use. Small 5 minute learning curve and then curled her whole head in no time with no problems. When there was too much hair it would start and the stop to let us know it was too much and to use a smaller amount of hair.
customer_reviews.author: KellyLynn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty good with my hair, hair products, and styling tools. This product burned my hair. When I took it out of the little barrel, it was singed and then proceeded to disintegrate into my hands. It took me 4 years to grow my hair out and 10 seconds for this product to destroy it. Additionally, without a printer in my home, it was a huge hassle to return and had to be returned to a UPS store which is not convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy Crosses On Etsy

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this at all. It gets stuck in my hair and it didn't even do that good of a job. I could have used bobby pins and done a better job than that. This was pretty much a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Caught on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this product! I followed the directions and used it on clean/detangled Hair. After curling over half of my hair, the INFINITY pro caught on my hair. I unplugged it and tried to gently pulled my hair out. After 30 min of trying by hand, my hair was still stuck. I didn’t want to cut my hair so I had to have my dad use his tools to try to unlock my hair from it. My hair was caught inside the mechinism. I had to break the tool in order to avoid a haircut. I have video proof. This product made me late me work.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: The curls really hold well. My hair stayed curled all day. I've only tried the high heat setting and my hair smoked a little, so it scared me, but my hair is still healthy. You really do need to use the hair strip sizes recommended or your hair will get stuck, but it's pretty easy to pull it out. I absolutely love it. It takes about 12 seconds per strip to curl, so about 30 minutes for my hair. P.S. My hair is very fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your curling irons!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought this for myself 5 years ago and loved it. I made this 2nd purchase because my 14 year old niece asked for one for Christmas. Mine is wonderful. I can truly attest that it holds up well over time. Don't use a lot of hair, especially if it is thick, as it will tangle. I've used this hundreds of times and have had maybe 5 tangles. I do not use hairspray as the curls hold up very well, even into the next day. Highly recommend for anyone who runs into the problem of dents received when using a curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: SBL

customer_reviews.title: Almost lost my hair. :-(
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product. I tried it once and my hair got stuck so bad I almost had to cut it off. It also did not curl consistently. I recommend to anyone wanting to try it, that they have someone there to help them in case they experience the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay pending what curl you want
customer_reviews.text: This is my second curler. My first lasted around 6 years with moderate use. I will say in the 6 years of using this my hair and others had their hair get caught around 5 times total. It was very rare but did happen. If your like me and like to be able to give wavy curls and then tight at other times. Not sure I’d suggest this. This is a great product for someone who wants to make a tight curls and semi fast. I loved how it beeps when done so no guess work on when to let you hair out
customer_reviews.author: lauren kane

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I am amazed by how this actually works! My niece took a piece of my hair and it just took my hair and poof it was sucked up into the chamber and when it beeped she released it and bam it was a long curl!! I have never seen anything like this before!! This was amazing!!!! Unbelievable product!! I have long straight hair and this just curled it with no fuss and no doing anything other then waiting for the beep which takes about 5 seconds! best gift yet!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Maliawco

customer_reviews.title: It works and doesn’t tangle at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have long curly hair and it worked like a champ. I was so afraid that my hair will get tangled up in that thing but it didn’t. Not only that but the spray that they suggest goes with it I spritzed it on my dry hair and then curl my hair and it stayed that way for for five days. People noticed people thought I’d gotten a perm or something, no wasn’t real curly but it was a real pretty wave. I’m tempted to buy three or four these things. You know all blowdryers finally give out as will vests and I just wanna make sure that I always have one on hand kiss I love it
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ann Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Hair got stuck & it burned a chunk of it off!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked nothing about it. I was hoping it would be good for me to use on my long hair and make curling my hair go by quicker but that was not the case. I’m sure this could be really great for people with shorter hair. And yes I read the directions carefully and went over it. I have longer hair and it got stuck in it and burned my hair off. Glad I did a piece of my hair that wouldn’t be noticeable if something happened to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Worst product for curling hair.
customer_reviews.text: Worst product for curling hair. I would never buy this product ever again. I would not recommend this product to anyone. My hair got stuck in it 5 times where I had to cut my hair trying to get it out. I’ve lost numerous chunks of hair with this product. I will not purchase Conair products after this. The 70 bucks I paid for this product is not enough to replace all the hair I lost. Do not BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather I.

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't do my own curls cuz the few times i've tried they were no good and also i'm lazy. A friend recomended this so i decided to give it a try, on my first i did it! my curls were beautiful and it didn't take long. It's a lot easier than using a wand. My friend told me about the tangling issues so i made sure to fine tooth comb through hair to get all knots out before doing a new section, and not too much hair per section so that might have helped, also my hair is a shoulder lengh i think that helps too. I totally recomend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayleen Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I've never been about to find a product that makes perfect curls until now. Does a fantastic job. If you get the hair mostly dry it will finish dry it but if you have thick hair or get a big lock, it has a hard time drying it all the way. I mainly use it after my hair is dry and it holds the curl for several days, it does loosen over that time but it's still curly. The only time I get the hair tangled is when the lock is to big or I haven't combed or smoothed it before I put it in
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Giddings

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but not so much in the actual usage
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. Good concept but not so much in the actual usage. Hair kept getting tangled and I re-read the directions and looked at photos numerous times. I was doing it correctly and not using too much hair. When it worked, it worked great. Nice bold curls. I just couldn't waste so much time trying to get this to work.
customer_reviews.author: *Rock Star*Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love the curls!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this as a gift for my sister.. she brought it with her when she came to visit, so we both used it... her hair is past her shoulders and mine is layered and comes to about my shoulders. We used the highest setting and the tightest curl setting.. It was amazing! My curls lasted for a good 3 days.. we just lightly sprayed hairspray and went out and about in the hot humid Texas heat! I’m thoroughly impressed. It was easy to use for both short and longer hair! So I’m going to get my own now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anissa

customer_reviews.title: USED! BEYOND DISGUSTING!
customer_reviews.text: I had read a review that said the curler was used and I thought “that would NEVER happen to me” since I’ve NEVER had this issue with any product before! Well, it’s Valentine’s Day morning and this was my daughters present since she LOVES having curly hair because her hair is so straight. I go to read the instructions and it says to make sure the clamp side is facing the head. So, I go ahead and grab the curler and BAM!! HAIR EVERYWHERE INSIDE THE CLAMP even though I JUST took it out of the box to figure out how to use it! SO GROSS!!!! DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY BUYING THIS!!!! Will most definitely be returning this TODAY!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Easy & curls last!!
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about this purchase at first but after using it twice I’ve completely figured it out and am able to curl my hair with ease as long as I have a hour to spare. I was never able to figure out how to curl with a flat iron or wand and always burnt my hand or scalp with a normal curler. This does all the work for you and is painless as long as you use small sections and brush beforehand. It will yank your hair out if you don’t brush you hair so just be sure to follow the instructions and you’ll be fine. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Layne

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally bought this! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this curling iron! I’ve waited years for it to come down in price and at $47 I finally made the jump! I love curling my hair but Have always hated wasting time doing it! Straightener curling never worked for me, so I’ve been stuck with a traditional curling iron that always left ugly kinks, or a wand that burned my fingers. Not anymore! I love this thing and my husband loves that in 15 minutes I’m done! It used to take me nearly 45 min to curl my hair and now it’s a breeze! Love that it alternates directions for each curl and that it automatically stops when it detects a snag. So perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs long hair over 7 inches to work. & RETURN POLICY A JOKE
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back 2 weeks ago dropping it off at the UPS store and getting a receipt. Where's my refund? LIMITED RANGE OF FUNCTION.. It requires longer hair to make curls. Tried with 6-7 inch hair with max heat and max 12 second timer. I knew it was too good to be true. Worked as easy as they say but my hair length was too short to get any meaningful results. Very disappointed. The model in NJ the demo videos hair is over 2x the length of mine.
customer_reviews.author: FR Dee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered NEW curler NOT USED. The only part I like about this curler is that, it's very easy to use. It take forever to heat up no wonder it was returned. Dryer power? NONE I couldn't be more disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ms1023

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun little gadget! This did exactly what I needed it to which was heat up quickly, give me three curl options depending on the look I want, curl it quickly without tangling, and has a handy timer that let's me know when to release my hair for my desired curl. I always wanted one of these so I could do what my hairstylist achieved for me, but I didn't want to break the bank. This product allowed me to get that salon look without any fuss on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Tshudy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo easy to use! And the curls are gorgeous. I have never had this much body from any curling iron...ever! I have naturally wavy coarse red hair just below my shoulder blades & this thing did a wonderful job & took half the time of a regular curling iron. After I was done my only thought was... where has this been all my life? Thank you Conair for making my life soooooo much easier! I cant say much about longevity because I just brought it today. And I dont know about drying power my hair was washed the night before & dried overnight.
customer_reviews.author: RBM4

customer_reviews.title: Anything is better than this
customer_reviews.text: This curling device is terrible. I have medium length hair just below my shoulders. I followed the directions. I even watched a video on how to use this. 3 things I dont like are 1. It's very heavy after holding it for half your head 2. Your hair gets easily caught in it and a few times it pulled my hair at the root 3. The curl, no matter what setting doesn't stay in your hair for long. It's a very weak curl that after an hour is gone. I find my hot rollers are easier, quicker and the curl stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this curler
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and used it for the first time. So easy to use! I gave it a four because if there are different lengths of hair, it gets stuck and/or cuts off. I had brain surgery, so one side is much shorter. Once I figured out why it was stopping, I just had to separate the shorter pieces, not a huge deal. The first picture is right after blowdrying (and you can tell which side is shorter). The second is after using the curler and running my fingers through the curls.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Curls
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for several months now, and I love it. I have short hair and my hair is naturally curly, so I wasn’t sure if my hair would be long enough to make this work, but I saw a YouTube video with another lady with a short stack like I have, so I bought it. It works perfectly. Just take small pieces, follow the instructions and you get perfect curls every single time.
customer_reviews.author: @oklahoma_alli

customer_reviews.title: Great Job Curling
customer_reviews.text: I have hair past the middle of my back; and a lot of it! Although it took some time curling only small 1" sections at a time, my hair turned out great. I used the highest setting for the maximum time. The curls have lasted for a second day. Very happy with this purchase. Make sure and not try to curl too much hair at one time and that the sections are combed out straight, otherwise, it can get tangled and pull some hair out.
customer_reviews.author: gator1fan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this product! I was one of those people that always had their hair straight or had to have friends curl my hair because I just couldn't do it myself. With the Conair Curl Secret I could do everything myself!! It heats up quickly, and curls quickly! I love the different settings so you can go from a wavy day look to a tighter night look with just the flick of a switch!! I got so many compliments that people find it odd when my hair is straight now! Excellent product. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone that has trouble with curling their own hair, it's a miracle worker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curls left side but not so much on right
customer_reviews.text: I used to be able to curl my hair as a teenager. Now I always have to rely on my daughter to curl my hair if I want the curls to stay. I bought this so I could hopefully curl my hair myself. It worked fairly well on the left side of my head. I knew when I got to the right side, I would have to adjust the wand so it was facing the correct direction. I did just as I was supposed to but I had little luck with getting curls to develop or stay on the right side of my head. I need to practice more so maybe I could improve my review.
customer_reviews.author: sally mcatee

customer_reviews.title: Good for waves... NOT actual curls!!
customer_reviews.text: Curls were never tight but only waves or curls that fell minutes after. I have very long hair and thought this was going to be great.... and it wasn't. I gave up on it when it got stuck in my daughter's hair and freaked us out!! Thankfully we were able to free the piece but it had me a bit worried after that. If u like waves go for it even though any iron could give these results (not impressive).... but for ringlets or actual curls that last... you should look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: N. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: This is the worse curling iron I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse curling iron I have ever had. After trying the loose curl settings with no results, I tried the tight curl settings with no better results. I made sure I was using this correctly and I was. To get any type of curl I had to saturate the strands with mousse. This worked a little better but still did not produce tight curls. I would return this product but do not want to pay the high shipping charges. Warning to all out there, DO NOT EXPECT RESULTS with any of the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great results and much better than more expensive competition!
customer_reviews.text: I received it and had to try it after my disappointing experience with the very similar product Chi Spin N Curl. And let me tell you: So similar and yet so different. Easier to use, less annoying sounds, the curls come out perfect and most of all: no tangling. I didn't have any problems using this and styled my whole head (medium long hair) within a couple minutes. This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: HRLY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that really works
customer_reviews.text: After watching videos of this product, I was concerned about my hair getting tangled. I have very long hair. This product was very easy to use. I actually used a little larger sections of hair being careful to get them fully into the chamber. I did this because the curling works so well using larger sections toned the curl down some. I curled my hair during the day, wore it all day, went to bed, and woke up with the curls still holding. I didn't use any hairspray or products before of after curling. A product that really does what it says.....GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing why have i waited so long to get one
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I was skeptical of this as there are so many products out there and with having super long hair I was worried it wouldn't curl it, I was proved wrong a perfect curl every time!!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaD

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent curls
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but flawed. Works well to curl but the curls are all inconsistent. It’s understandable that diffent angles would result in different curl types, but very difficult to release the hair exactly the same way each time to have a uniform looking set of curls. Practiced and couldn’t figure it out. Anyone have suggestions please share your tricks. I have long thick dark (Asian) hair so by the end of an event (3-4hours) curls straighten out. because of that, I use this mainly now to achieve volume for updos. Or high pony with messy curls.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineB

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest product. I had really high hopes for this
customer_reviews.text: It' only takes a small section of your hair. If you have lots of hair, it because extremely time consuming. Not only, that but I have long hair and it seems to only curl half or less of the piece of hair I'm working on most of the time. And it's not the bottom section.... it's the mid-section that curls and the bottom section is left straight! Then I have to run it again starting much lower so it will curl the bottom, leaving everything uneven. Not the greatest product. I had really high hopes for this.
customer_reviews.author: AndiPandi

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this curler. I have two daughter's and it's a process getting their hair ready in the morning. I can take a few pieces of hair and just add a bit of curl to the bottom of their hair. It's quick and works like a dream. When we have a special event, I section off their hair and take my time doing smaller curls. Every SINGLE time I use this, we are flooded with comments on how beautiful my kids look. If this breaks, I'll buy another immediately. I can't imagine I went without this thing having two daughter's. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Mom 2 Twin Snowflakes

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use and was such a time saver. I usually spend 3 hours or more curling my hair but with this it only took an hour and a half. It heats up so that your hair curls but not enough to burn your hair or your hands, your hair never gets stuck because it beeps and release the hair. My hair was so soft afterwards and the curls were tight. The only problem I had was it doesn't get all the way down to the edges (baby hairs) but the curls were so tight that you couldn't even tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Curls, Curls and more Curls!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curler! I had one for a few years. Unfortunately I dropped it and a piece broke off and it stopped working. When I saw the price of this one I grabbed it! Less than $50 is a great deal!! It takes me about an hour to do my whole head. I did this with it on the medium setting. It’s important to take small sections or your hair can get tangled. So if you just take your time, use small sections, your hair can look great for a few days! Happy Curling!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Huber

customer_reviews.title: I almost lost my hair
customer_reviews.text: Let’s just start this out that I am not one to write reviews, unless they're worthy of praise or disdain. This... tool.. should be sold as a torture device. I reread the instructions and watched the videos and almost had to cut my hair out because of it. The curling rods do 10000% better and leave no tangles.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: 1st try, I thought it was broken, but you just have to get the hang of it. It's a REAL GAME CHANGER. I'm wearing my hair down for the 1st time in 2 decades! It's amazing! It takes less than 10min to do a full head of hair that's past my shoulders & thick. It's easy, painless, flawless & only needs a light touch up the next day + it makes your curls glossy. My hairdresser is shocked & buying one, too!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Beachy Waves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this but was skeptical (and a little scared) to try it out! It worked beautifully. Best to clip up hair so you are only working on the section you want curled and make sure you comb well - and then you put the unit in your hair where you wanted the curl/wave to start and close it - and after 4 beeps (beautiful waves)! I did not have any problems with hair sticking in the unit, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving this product to use. I purchased what was supposed to be a new item, but to my shock and disappointment I received a used item that still had someone else's hair in it. Looking at the box I could tell it had been opened previously. I will reorder the item, but if I receive another used item I will be highly upset.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss E.

customer_reviews.title: My hair got stuck
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as I needed a curler that easily curled my hair. However I plan to return thid as my hair kept getting stuck or maybe i didnt know how to use it much... i have straight hair and wanted curls from near the roote of my hair..but this curler seems to only put in hair from the botton so basically not much close to your scalp area..only half of the bottom hair will be curled. I am planning to return this as it didnt work for me..My hair got stuck in it snd I had to pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: warisha warraich

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to for curls!
customer_reviews.text: This is the hair tool I've been waiting for! My thick, shoulder length hair is curly already, but my curls are uneven: in some places I have ringlets and in other areas I have loose waves. Thanks to Conair's InfinitiPro Curl Secret, I can add ringlets where needed! It does take a little practice and I strongly suggest reading the instructions from start to finish. I get a lot more compliments on my hair since adding this tool to my curl arsenal. I may never use a curling iron or wand again!
customer_reviews.author: AreZee

customer_reviews.title: Did not work on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have slightly longer than chin-length wavy hair and ordered this product thinking that it would give me a nice loose curl. I was wrong. It might work for longer hair, but if your hair is above the shoulder, don't waste your money. It is kind of easy to use but did not curl my hair AT ALL. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Himmelberger

customer_reviews.title: Easy curls!
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing! I have long hair and get bored by the straightness of it every now and then. It really is simple to use. What you need to do is be careful that there are NO strays that will end up sticking out the sides. THAT is what will cause a tangle. I am lucky enough that I have not burned my hair when it has been caught, but it really taught me to be careful. It will take 2 seconds more to be careful and you'll be glad you did. It feels a little flimsy but I've taken it traveling quite a bit and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Yet another Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I can curl my hair now!
customer_reviews.text: I am now able to curl my entire head of hair! I have never in my life been successful until this product. Wow. It stops if you try to put too much hair to curl at one time, and I’ve had a few scares where I thought I’d have to cut my hair but gently work it and you can pull your hair out easily. Overall I’m so happy and I can finally curl my hair
customer_reviews.author: Carly Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty hard to maneuver on short and long hair
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty hard to maneuver on short and long hair. My long hair would get caught and tangled if not placed correctly which is hard to do a majority of the time. Onto a small amount of hair fit or was allowed at a time. The concept is there but maybe I'm just not meant to have this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: It did not work on my hair at all. I tried it on my daughters hair thinking maybe it was mine but it didn’t work on hers either. I have short shoulder length hair & my daughter has mid back long length hair. I first used it with 2 day unwashed hair & thought maybe I should try with freshly washed hair. Unfortunately it still didn’t work and while my hair was being taken in the curl section there were moments where it seemed like it got caught & stopped so I had to pull out my hair from the product.
customer_reviews.author: Simona

customer_reviews.title: love it! If you read the directions and understand ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She 33, I 50 something....anyway, I was the Guinea pig for this.....love it! If you read the directions and understand how to use, no problem. Yes, did get hair "caught" a few times, no big deal, it did not rip my hair from the roots or cause breakage. I have flat straight hair, and using a curling iron is a pain in the ass! This is amazing, and the curls last! I felt pretty for the first time in a long time! Bye bye curling irons!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Tarczynski

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a miracle curling tool but this wasn’t for me. I have fine hair and the curls came out fine but I did have a section of hair get caught in it. I almost had to cut my hair but after using something to pry my hair out it finally came loose. I may just stay with a regular curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER LEE

customer_reviews.title: The best curling iron I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting this because it wasn’t expensive compared to a bunch of other brands but this thing works so good & is so easy to use! It used to take forever to curl my hair just for the curls to fall 3 hours later but with this curling iron, I can curl my hair in half the time & it lasts all day, sometimes 2 days with a little touch up!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, color treated, pin straight hair. I was a little skeptical when i bought this but i was pleasantly surprised. It curled my hair beautifully and quickly. The curls also lasted over an entire day. I was also able to curl my daughters hair. After having tried this curler on long hair I truely suggest this product. Only draw back is that its a little cumbersome to maneuver until you get use to it. All in all the thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Makes a spinning and beeping sound when I turn it on every time
customer_reviews.text: The first time I plugged it in it didn’t do this. The second and now this time this is what it does. Is this normal? I can’t find anything online about it doing this. I’m thinking I’ll be sending this back. It ashamed cause it was amazing the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie M.

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love,love, love this. I have been using a curling iron for years and bought myself this a few months ago and have not gone back to the regular curling iron. A women at work said the new hair style took 10 years off of me. I think that is a bit much but I'll take the compliment. It also cut my hair prep time down by about 10 minutes. I do occasionally get my hair caught in this so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Maryeileen

customer_reviews.title: Not a Win for Me
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended this product bc she really likes her results, but I find it terribly clunky to use and it chews up my hair a little too often than I like. My curls just look okay, and it takes too long to get those curls when I'm running on a tight schedule.
customer_reviews.author: merryberry

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived this week and all I can say is amazing. I have long thick hair
customer_reviews.text: This arrived this week and all I can say is amazing. I have long thick hair, unruly is a good name for it. The usability of this product makes it a must have for those who have problems with using a curling or flat iron. The curls stay in for 2-3 days. There is a timer to tell when each curl is complete. With my hair, again long and very thick, I completed the entire head in 20 minutes. I watched reviews and you tube for some time before I purchased, So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Steele

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, may work better on different hair types
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. My hair is bone straight, fine, and very silky. Not sure if I need more texture or what. It is the confirmation brand, was packaged nice, and came fast. My hair curls with super heated curling irons tho. So maybe this does not work on my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: Jack-Attack

customer_reviews.title: Curled but did not hold
customer_reviews.text: I have natural curly hair. To make my curl more uniform I purchased this curler. I love the application and the ease of use (once you get the correct amount in the intake). The problem I see is that it did not hold my curls in place. They lasted for only an hour or so. Not worth all the effort.
customer_reviews.author: B Olie

customer_reviews.title: Hair curler
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted this and then when I finally got it I hated it. My hair got caught up in it and thought I was going to cut the hair off to get out og it. I went to school for hair dressing so it's not like I have no clue. I just wasn't going to risk it again. Maybe it's great for others but I won't try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Takes FOREVER to do your whole head!
customer_reviews.text: If you have an hour to do your hair, this is for you. It takes forever to do a whole head of hair if you have medium length hair with this product. You can only use a half an inch to 1 inch strand of hair at a time. And if you’re doing your whole head, that’s a lot of hair! Unless your hair is perfect, it can tangle very easily in the machine. It does make a great curl, But using a curling iron is just as easy and a whole lot faster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for short hair
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and tried it today. Curled my short hair nicely. I’ve tried tons of products and this one really seems to work. My hair is fine and doesn’t curl easily. Don’t know how long the curls will last but I am happy. I previously ordered one of the newer type power curlers and did not work for short hair.
customer_reviews.author: K. Orbesen

customer_reviews.title: Safety stop works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Make sure to have all tangled out of hair. If you have highlighted hair I suggest try on lowest setting to prevent burning hair If you hair does have tangle their is a safety that will stop so it don’t pull your hair out. I was little worried at first but the safety works great.
customer_reviews.author: Donyell

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not very satisfied with the product . The motor pulled a number of my hair out before actually coming up a curl. It also doesn't curl within the first application I had to run it thru at least three time on each strand of hair before actually getting somewhat of a curl
customer_reviews.author: Myreview

customer_reviews.title: Not easy, if use on your own then hair tangles.
customer_reviews.text: Can not use on your own. Not easy at all. You will take half of your hair out by tangled in it. You need someone who knows how to use it, specially on back.
customer_reviews.author: A N

customer_reviews.title: Love it on longer hair
customer_reviews.text: This is great for longer hair but since my husband bought it as a gift for me (his wife) and I have shorter hair. I cannot say the same for short hair. I used it on my daughter who has longer hair and it worked beautifully. Hence I gave this 5 stars. But I do not recommend it on shorter hair. But for long hair it works AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best styling tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough wonderful things about this curling tool!!!!! This will make your hair 10X nicer than what they can do in a salon. It's worth every penny! A lot of people say it damaged their hair..it never damaged mine. You really have to be patient and take the time to learn how to use it. It's time consuming to do your hair, you must curl small, thin pieces of hair at a time but its worth it b/c it will last daysssss! I don't go to the salon anymore b/c they can't achieve what this tool can! It won't last forever, this is my second one. The first one lasted about a year. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Schorr

customer_reviews.title: It's 77W (not 55W like some other girl said it was)
customer_reviews.text: So many things to say! First, this product DOES work and is the real-deal. It's 77W (not 55W like some other girl said it was)... Second, IT WORKS! :) I have long thick hair down near my mid-back. If you follow the directions you'll have no problem! I did 1/2inch thick strips of my hair and it worked great! I tried a little more and it did tangle, but it has a de-tangle feature where it BEEP BEEP BEEPs at you and essentially tells you "try again stupid". Would recommend to anyone who wants to curl their hair super-easy. It's gonna be a little time consuming but worth it for the beautiful curls you'll get!
customer_reviews.author: debbie godschalk

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for me
customer_reviews.text: I second everything others have said..... I have medium length slightly wavy, thin-ish hair. Since it only allows an inch of hair at a time, it takes FOREVER to do a whole head; the thing is too heavy to hold up behind your head for as long as it takes to get all the hair done; hair gets stuck too easily; and here's one I haven't read yet: the curls come out so tightly wound that they look kind of silly, yet any amount of finger-combing produces ugly frizz. The thing is useless.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions and this works great.
customer_reviews.text: This curling iron is a great way to curl hair and not have it slip off the iron. My daughter has long thick hair and this is the first time I have had any success curling her hair. It takes a little practice and you must be careful to not put too much hair in the curling chamber. I read the instructions carefully before our first attempt at curling and didnt have any problems using the curler. I am not sure this would be as easy to do on my own hair but it is easy to use on someone elses hair.
customer_reviews.author: SVPTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great curling tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat hair tool I bought this for my Girlfriend and to be honest we were both a little nervous to put her hair in this curling iron but after reading the instructions and a deep breath she put her hair in and Bam! we were both blown away.
customer_reviews.author: phillippe

customer_reviews.title: You have to become a mirror ninja!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this curler one night on HSN and bought it for a cheaper price through Amazon. I do like the curler, but there are a few things I do have a problem with. It is hard to do the left size of your head if your right handed, also to do the back of your head is nearly impossible! I have to be a mirror ninja just to get the back of hair done. I was worried about my hair getting caught in the curler, since I had seen some comments from others about this happening to them. I will say luckily this has never happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: kldice

customer_reviews.title: I love the curls!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one the first one was good for a few years of heavy use so I wasn’t upset I had to replace the first one. I love the curls and they last 2 days on me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I kind of liked this product. As the other reviewers mentioned the hair gets stuck often when you try to curl a thick strand of hairs, take as thin strand as possible and try curling it you'll surly love your hair with the curls. And yes the curls remain for min 3 days ( if not combed )
customer_reviews.author: Vasavi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curls! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best purchase of my life. I bought this after burning my neck with the tip of the curling wand. This is incredibly easy to use, works perfectly on short hair. I find it impossible to ever burn my self again. My hair looks like hay after it dries. It is completely damaged, but transforms in seconds with this device!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole V.

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased this hair curler!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased this hair curler! It does take a little while to get the hang of doing it correctly (my issue was putting too much hair in at a time) - but this gives me the best spiral curls by far that any other curling iron has (and I have tried quite a few). My hair is about 6 inches past my shoulder. I have received so many compliments on my hair since I started using this! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: A confusing curl
customer_reviews.text: So it wasn’t that easy to figure out on my own and instructions were not clear I had to look it up on YouTube how to use it but then once I figured it out it was quite easy it doesn’t make as good of a curl as I’d like but it does actually work I’m just a little picky on how big my girls are but the girls do work and I plan to use it for my daughters hair
customer_reviews.author: jessica vidal mendez

customer_reviews.title: your hair will get stuck in this
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews... Make sure when using this you have a small section. Also if for any reason it stops to kick out that section do NOT put that section back in the curler it will get stuck and its a nightmare if your lucky enough to remove. Remember if you do get your hair caught unplug and turn off the iron immediately. The iron gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used properly it's is amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you use small segments of hair and place the device in the proper way it's amazing. If it gets caught don't panick, you.used too much hair. Gently pull the hair downwards and it's like a straightening iron and will come right out. I used this for NYE and.it looked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't send the makeup brushes. Curler works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Curler does what it was supposed to do. BUT they say it comes with a set of make up brushes. It didn't. They wouldn't just send the brushes. Feel ripped off because I don't want to return the curler and wait again for the stuff I actually paid for. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  Berg

customer_reviews.title: so easy good for carpal and arthritis problems
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love love it!!! No wrist turning ever again I have arthritis and give up on my hair half way through, with this I can finish fast with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!! It curls my hair perfectly. Love how quickly it heats up. It is a little bit hard to remember to keep one side toward my head, but it works like a dream. And, If it use it twice in the same spot, it curls it even tighter. It will beep you and refuse to work if you have too much hair in the curl. Then you just let the curl fall out and try again. I have never had it get caught in a way that I could not get it out - unlike my regular curling brush... Just be patient and take it slow. You'll have a headful of curls in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Curls last for days!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this! I have waist length naturally wavy hair that is very thick and heavy and has never held a curl before this thing. I get perfect curls that LAST! The first picture I posted is halfway through the day after curling my hair and the second picture is after I slept all night with it in a bun.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I was excited upon ordering but I ended up returning it as it can only hold too little hair to curl so it really looks ugly and it eats up your hair so it gets tangled and so hard to take off since it's scary to just pull it out. I
customer_reviews.author: lecoy and mimister

customer_reviews.title: Magical Curling Robot!
customer_reviews.text: I found this item by complimenting a woman’s hair and lamenting that I could never quite grasp how to curl my own hair. She told me about this product, and since she was so insistent that it was impossible to mess up, I purchased it. People, this is a curling robot! You don’t have to twist it, burn yourself or thing about which way it is curling. There is a timer to guarantee even the least skilled of us an have fabulous hair! I couldn’t resist taking this photo because my hair has never looked like this at home before. It took about 10-15 minutes for the very first time doing my whole head. This is magic, y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It heats - it curls - it FRIZZES. If I were to use this with my natually dried hair (air or blowdryer) I would look like a curly frizzball. In order to use this and look pretty, I have to dry and straighten my hair first. I still like the end results though, so I kept it. It holds curl and looks lovely once done. My hair is about 4 inches below my shoulders, and it takes 45 minues give or take to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use & so so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm someone who has just never curled my hair, and the idea of using a normal curling iron just never appealed to me. Seemed like too much work and I'm pretty clumsy so I was afraid of burning myself. This curling iron is SO GOOD. The instruction manual lets you know the different settings and what you should based on your hair type and what curls you want are so useful. It's easy to use and makes beautiful curls, so long as you follow the instructions correctly. I would absolutely recommend this for someone like me, who has never curled their own hair before.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! I suck at curling my hair and this made it so easy. My hair is so straight and fine and this helped keep the curl all night and the next day. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Curls curls curls but it fried a couple sections 😢
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty amazing but it caught my hair a couple of times and my ends looked kinda fried when it got stuck. Easy to use with a little practice and it does produce curls. But frying my hair even once is not a option for me
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Don't make any curly
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair, and I had good recommendations to use this accessory, but for me it did not work, it dared all my hair and my hair got stuck and it does not work at all
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: horrible product
customer_reviews.text: the curling iron on lasted a few months before it broke. My daughters hair got caught in the curling iron and I was not able to remove her hair. I was not even able to unscrew the small screws to take a part the curling iron!!! I ended up cutting my daughters long long hair!!! very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma M.

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I‘m amazed at how well this works! You do have to section your hair smaller and it will take about 15 minutes. I have shoulder length, perfectly straight hair and can get a head of girls in that time by myself. Read the instructions. Follow the instructions. Don‘t try to do too much hair at once and make sure you get the right side toward your head.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: So easy & fun, and curls last for days
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this, de ssf pure seeing negative reviews and videos. It has been so much easier and quicker to use on my chin-length A-line bob then a curling or flat iron. Curls last for days. Not heavy like others reported.
customer_reviews.author: Carina M Muehl

customer_reviews.title: Bad advertisement, inaccurate description!
customer_reviews.text: after curling my hair, the result does not come the same as the youtube reviews. The wave of hair does not look good. I did not have time to test it after i bought it, and it went past the return period, i would definitely want to return it. It's better to buy the traditional hair curler.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: Got it today and I'm super happy! It was really easy to use and gave me beautiful curls! It would be great to define some natural curls too. I used it on dry, clean, next day hair. I used both hi and low settings on 8 & 10, then finger combed.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen Hoagland-Easton

product_meta.title: INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Curl Secret, Purple
product_meta.description: Style Name:CURL SECRET| Color:PurpleThe secret is out! Discover a revolutionary new way to create beautiful, shiny curls. The Conair InfinitiPro Curl Secret Hair Styler features the latest technology for tangle-free curls that won’t quit. With auto-curl technology your hair is automatically and gently drawn into the tourmaline ceramic curl chamber where it is held, timed and heated from all directions to effortlessly form the perfect curl. No matter your hair length or type, this hair curling tool makes achieving consistently flawless curls easier than ever. This revolutionary styling tool puts a modern twist on your everyday curling iron. The professional brushless motor is built to have a longer life and it offers precision styling with a safety sensor to ensure easy, tangle-free curls every time. The V-shaped hair guide in the center of the curling chamber perfectly positions hair while two professional heaters heat hair from all directions to create even, beautiful, flowing curls. Plus, the auto-beep indicator lets you know when hair is done for the perfect curl every time. Tourmaline ceramic technology reduces frizz and flyaways while also protecting hair from damage. The high performance heater heats instantly and evenly, up to 400-degrees for long-lasting curls and waves. Plus with 2 heat levels and 3 timer settings—8, 10 and 12 seconds—you can customize your look and choose between loose, medium, or tight curls. You’re in control! The body of this multifunctional hair styler was ergonomically designed to fit comfortably in the palm of your hand for prolonged styling. And there are no worries about leaving the styler on as it features a sleep mode for energy-efficient auto power reduction and a safety auto-off feature. Also includes a chamber cleaning tool to keep your hair curler free of dust, hair and debris for a longer life. With the Conair InfinitiPro Curl Secret Hair Styler, you get soft, beautiful curls every time you style.
